title: Onde Series
description: Le Onde Series translates the movement of Venetian canals into clean flowing lines. Each piece responds to the natural grain of the wood, creating a wave pattern that is entirely unique. Hand-carved with precision, these objects reflect both the artistry of traditional Venetian craftsmanship and a contemporary aesthetic — elegant and distinctive.
